SEARCH
Package com.smsapp.services.implementations

Class StudentImpl

java.lang.Object
com.smsapp.services.implementations.StudentImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStudent
public class StudentImpl extends Object implements IStudent
Implementation of the IStudent interface for managing student records in a school management system. This class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on student data, as well as additional functionalities such as assigning random houses to students.

The class interacts with the database using JDBC, leveraging SQL queries defined in the Queries class. It handles operations involving the `Student` and `Address` entities, ensuring data consistency and proper resource management.

Key methods include:

  • addStudent(Student): Adds a new student to the database, including their address.
  • getStudentById(int): Retrieves a student's details by their ID, including their address.
  • getAllStudents(): Retrieves a list of all students, including their addresses.
  • updateStudent(Student): Updates the details of an existing student and their address.
  • deleteStudent(int): Deletes a student from the database by their ID.
  • assignRandomHouse(int): Assigns a random house to a student.

The implementation ensures proper handling of database connections and transactions, committing changes where necessary and rolling back in case of errors. It also includes exception handling to manage potential issues with database operations.

Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a new student to the database.

      This method performs the following operations:

      • Inserts the student's address into the database and retrieves the generated address ID.
      • Inserts the student's details into the `student` table using the retrieved address ID.

      Specified by:
      addStudent in interface IStudent
      Parameters:
      student - The Student object containing the details of the student to be added.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the insertion process.

    • getStudentById

      public Student getStudentById(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Retrieves a student by their ID.

      This method fetches the details of a student from the database using the specified student ID. It also retrieves the address associated with the student.

      Specified by:
      getStudentById in interface IStudent
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Student object with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If no student with the specified ID is found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the retrieval process.

    • getAllStudents

      public List<Student> getAllStudents()
      Retrieves a list of all students.

      This method fetches all student records from the database, including their associated addresses.

      Specified by:
      getAllStudents in interface IStudent
      Returns:
      A List of Student objects representing all students in the database.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the retrieval process.

    • updateStudent

      public void updateStudent(Student student) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing student.

      This method updates the student's information in the database, including their address.

      Specified by:
      updateStudent in interface IStudent
      Parameters:
      student - The Student object containing the updated details of the student.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the update process.

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Deletes a student from the database by their ID.

      This method removes the student record from the database. It first deletes any associated records in the `student_teacher` junction table before removing the student.

      Specified by:
      deleteStudent in interface IStudent
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to be deleted.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the deletion process.

    • assignRandomHouse

      public void assignRandomHouse(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Assigns a random house to a student.

      This method randomly selects a house from a predefined list and assigns it to the student with the specified ID.

      Specified by:
      assignRandomHouse in interface IStudent
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to whom a house is to be assigned.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the student with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      RuntimeException - If a database error occurs during the assignment process.
